Uses of Package
ussr.comm

Packages that use ussr.comm
ussr.comm An abstract communications model comprising transmitters, receivers, and packets. 
ussr.model An abstract model of a modular robot to be used from the controller. 
ussr.physics.jme A physics simulation implementation based on JME (JMonkeyEngine). 
ussr.robotbuildingblocks Building blocks for constructing simulation scenarios. 
ussr.samples.atron Simulation examples based on the ATRON modular self-reconfigurable robot. 
ussr.samples.atron.network   
ussr.samples.mtran Preliminary simulations based on the M-TRAN modular self-reconfigurable robot 
ussr.samples.odin Simulation examples based on the Odin modular, reconfigurable robot. 
ussr.samples.white   
ussr.sandbox Sandbox for experimentation 
 

Classes in ussr.comm used by ussr.comm
GenericReceiver
          An abstract implementation of the Receiver interface.
GenericTransmitter
          An abstract implementation of the Transmitter interface.
Packet
          A simulated packet, can be transmitted using all types of transmission
PacketReceivedObserver
          Observer interface for reacting to packet reception.
Receiver
          A device that can receive packets from some transmission source.
TransmissionType
          A type of transmission supported by a given transmission device.
Transmitter
          A device that can transmit packets to some receiver device.

Transmitter
          A device that can transmit packets to some receiver device.
